name: Verify scan is initiated successfully with valid chatbot and environment IDs -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends POST request to initiate a scan with chatbot "c1ca42ab-a401-45b0-a945-d9cd549d7590" and environment "aae0a1b6-fafe-40af-ab20-87934343521f"
When the user receives the scan initiation response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for successful scan initiation
And the response should contain a "scan_id"
And the response status should be "SCAN_REQUESTED"

fullName: Initiate Scan using Genr3d API: Verify scan is initiated successfully with valid chatbot and environment IDs
